title: Strong hybrids rev up to fly past EVs in green race as car sales make a pit stop
description: Strong hybrid vehicle sales grew 62.5% in the June quarter, driven by the Uttar Pradesh govt's incentives. In contrast, electric vehicle sales have stalled due to range anxiety and costs. Manufacturers are now exploring alternative technologies, such as hybrids and flex-fuel, to bridge the gap. The Indian EV infra remains a work in progress.
